item.title: Steve part 5
item.description:
mmmm BRAINS

Now that I have the TinyBX mounted and connected the time has come to get some gateware going. After some research I settled on nMigen. It is constant development and m-labs is working hard to get it running. There is a repository of my code as I develop it.

item.title: Boneless
item.description:
A gateware CPU

The Boneless-CPU is a soft CPU written in nmigen by Whitequark.

It is a 16bit Von Neumann machine with a completely flat memory space , registers and all. The gateware is nice and compact and fits into about 500 LUTS plus memory.
